actions.text: Amendment SA 6597, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 88 - 8. Record Vote Number: 418.
Amendment SA 6597 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Klobuchar to Amendment SA 6552. (consideration: CR S10073; text: CR S10093-10094) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6597 proposed by Senator Schumer for Senator Klobuchar to Amendment SA 6552.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 6597, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 88 - 8. Record Vote Number: 418.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 6597, under the order of 12/22/22, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 88 - 8. Record Vote Number: 418.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.
